Tool

NameSelect Grid from List
ID32
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2015
Specificationgrid

Description

Main use of this tool is to support tool chain development, allowing to pick a single grid from a grid list.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid List Grid list (input)GRIDS
Output
Grid (*)Grid (optional output)GRID
Options
IndexIntegerINDEXMinimum: 0 Default: 0
(*) optional
